title: No rewards
body: Everyone has gotten their rewards and boarders for ending the season silver or higher and i ended the season silver 5 and still havent gotten any rewards or loading screens or anything

replies.body: Not everyone gets their rewards at the same time, I haven't received any rewards either. I've hit Gold on both Solo/Duo and 3v3 Flex. Just wait a few weeks. If you haven't received your rewards by, lets say end of November, contact Riot Support.

Those rewards will still be going out over the next couple weeks, but if you're concerned you might have been skipped make sure you shoot a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) over!
